response.overview: We follow Kari on tours through Germany and Northern Norway, visiting her parents in Svolvær, and in the home of her good friend, Ketil Bjørnstad. Kari lives a hectic life with an ever-present passion for both music and life itself. Through this documentary we get a unique insight into the life of one of Norway's most famous and beloved artists.
response.title: Kari Bremnes Mitt hjerte
